summary: This document is a billing statement from AT&T Wireless for the account of Martin Golick, detailing charges, payments, and service usage for the billing cycle ending on August 14, 2004. It includes a summary of monthly charges, adjustments, and various service details. This document appears to be a detailed account of voice usage for a phone number associated with Martin Golick, including call times, durations, and locations. It contains numerous entries of incoming and outgoing calls, primarily from Palm Beach, Florida, and New York, New York, with various charges listed for the calls. This document contains detailed records of voice usage and charges associated with an AT&T Wireless account belonging to Martin Golick. It includes timestamps, call durations, and descriptions of the calls made and received, primarily from locations in Florida and New York. This document contains detailed records of voice usage and charges associated with an AT&T Wireless account belonging to Martin Golick. It includes call logs, data usage, and charges incurred during specific dates, highlighting various incoming and outgoing calls primarily from Palm Beach, Florida.

persons.name: Martin Golick
